src:
Poznato je koliko će Pavkov odsustvovati
07 Nov 2019, 18:03 by Milos
Milan Pavkov napustio je utakmicu između Crvene zvezde i Totenhema 12 minuta pre kraja susreta, zbog povrede skočnog zgloba.
Kako saznaje Mozzart sport, napadač iz Begeča moraće da miruje minimum tri nedelje, što znači da će propustiti utakmicu petog kola B grupe Lige šampiona, koju će Crvena zvezda igrati protiv minhenskog Bajerna u Beogradu, 26. novembra.
Trener Vladan Milojević će u narednom periodu imati na raspolaganju trojicu centralnih napadača: Ričmonda Boaćija, Tomanea i Nikolu Krstovića (koji se takođe vodi kao strani fudbaler).

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
It is known how much Pavkov will be absent
07 Nov 2019, 17:03 by Milos
Milan Pavkov left the match between Red Star and Tottenham 12 minutes before the end of the match due to a ankle injury.
According to Mozzart sport, the Begec striker will have to stay at least three weeks, which means he will miss the fifth round of the Champions League Group B Group B game, which Red Star will play against Bayern Munich in Belgrade on November 26th.
Coach Vladan Milojevic will have three central strikers available in the coming period: Richmond Boaci, Tomane and Nikola Krstovic (who is also a foreign football player).
